short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get maximum value from every meeting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DataHawk helps you research about the people you are meeting just from their email address in ONE-click. This will add an icon next to their name/email address on the Google calendar. On click, it will open all details about the person:

- All their social media handles
- Description of the person
- Current company information and latest news about the company
- Location of the person and local weather and time
- Local news of the place where the person stays
- Conversation starters based on their latest posts
- Employment and education history

ALL in one place with just a click!
